content.text: Hemera Protocol transforms crypto data into semantic values, powering the decentralized AI future. It democratizes data ownership and access in Web3, making it easier for developers to work with blockchain data.
How does Hemera Protocol help developers?

Hemera creates an account-centric indexing protocol that abstracts away complex on-chain data structures and smart contract logic. Developers can express new assets and contracts using User-defined Functions (UDFs), significantly simplifying blockchain development.
